dosageaction.description: How the medication is taken. Examples are Chew, Take, Inhale, etc.

dosagequantityvalue.description: How many of this med is taken.

dosagequantityunit.description: The unit of the quantity. Example: tablets, sprays, etc.

dosagefrequencyvalue.description: How many times (in the given time unit) this should be taken.

dosagefrequencyunit.description: The unit of the frequency. Example: per day, per week.

dosagefrequencydescription.description: A standardized patient-friendly frequency. Example: 6 per day becomes "every 4 hours".

dosageroute.description: How this medication is taken. Example: oral, inhalation, intranasal, etc.

dosagedurationvalue.description: How many duration time units this medication should be taken for.

dosagedurationunit.description: The unit of the duration. Example: days. So take this for days.
